question:
A discrete random variable \(X\) has the following probability distribution.

Find the value of \(k\).

[4]
a.

Write down \({\text{P}}(X = 2)\).

[1]
b.

Find \({\text{P}}(X = 2|X > 0)\).

[3]
c.

valid approach     (M1)
